#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define MOD 1000000007
using namespace std;

typedef long long int LL;

int main()
{
    //freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    LL t,n;
    long double x=0.4342944819032518276511289189166;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
       cin>>n;
        printf("%d\n",(int)(x*n+1));
    }
}
